name: Roll. Shoot. Die.
description:
Roll. Shoot Die! is a Top Down Shooter where rolling the dice generates a brand new weapon. Survive against the domino onslaught for as long as possible!

Created as part of the GMTK Game Jam 2022
https://itch.io/jam/gmtk-jam-2022

Controls
WASD to Move the Dice
Move the Mouse to Aim, Left-Click to Shoot
Press Space to Dice Roll (useful for evading enemies and reloading!)
Top Tip: Hold Space to charge your Roll!
